title: Manhunt
notes: If you can't get it to launch in fullscreen mode after you changed it to widescreen in the options: select a different resolution in the launcher, launch the game, quit it and launch it again with your native resolution.
Can't get past gate in Born Again
title: Manhunt

notes:
At first I encountered a bug which prevented me from passing a gate in the tutorial area. This is a known bug which also impacts many Windows users. The problem went away after I replaced manhunt.exe with a patched executable found here: https://steamcommunity.com/app/12130/discussions/0/828939978361803059/
The game now runs flawlessly.
title: Manhunt

notes: Wont launch in fullscreen. Game itself runs flawlessly.
title: Manhunt

notes: It wouldn't work full screen at first until I rebooted. I also had a controller plugged in, so the game ignored the mouse inputs for some reason. Once I unplugged the controller and rebooted, it worked a treat.
